div.pre: 1453 Asia Minor, c. 1962 Burial: c. 150-140 B.C. (Kleiner) Contents: 71+ AR Lot A Prusias I and II: 11 tetradr. Eumenes II: 5 tetradr. Side: 5 tetradr. Demetrius I: 8 tetradr. (Antiocheia) Cistophori: 42 (Pergamum 5, ANS 1971.101.1 Tralles 2) Lot B Cistophori: 15 (Pergamum 6, Ephesus 3, Tralles 5, Apameia 1) Disposition: Lot A dispersed. G. Hirsch, Feb. 21-2, 1963, nos. 1269, 1271-2, 1302-4, 1311, 1313-4; June 25-8,1963, nos. 429, 441, 478 Lot B New York Boehringer, Zur Chronologie, pp. 183-5, illus. (Lot A) To be published by F. Kleiner Lot B said to be found in Asia Minor 1962. The 15 Cistophori are almost certainly part of the 35 unattributed cistophori of Lot A
